text: Zanoni musrikaro to imon najovarand, ʙa zani magired va kanizi mu'mina ʙehtar az ozodzani musrika ast, harcand sumoro az u xus ojad. Va ʙa mardoni musrik to imon najovarand, zani mu'mina madihed. Va ʙandai mu'min ʙehtar az musrik ast, harcand sumoro az u xus ojad. Inho ʙa sui otas da'vat mekunand va Xudo ʙa coniʙi ʙihistu omurzis. Va ojoti xudro oskor ʙajon mekunad, ʙosad, ki ʙijandesand
